thread.section_title: VIP Communications Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of VIP Communications | joinvip.com
thread.title: Mohammed Jemal
thread.title_full: VIP Communications reviewed by Mohammed Jemal

author: Mohammed Jemal
title: Mohammed Jemal
text: Customer service is great. phone connection quality is great. usage time is accurately calculated for each use time and accurately reflected at the beginning of the next call. No usage time is counted until finally connected to the phone number dialed. The website is very user friendly and online purchase of additional time is so easy.
